ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 430
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It depends on the zone. I zone into nexus and bazaar fairly quickly because they are small zones. But shadowhaven is a large zone with alot of npcs and it
ygData.messageBody:
> For the record, does Luclin run slow for everyone? The only time I ever go
> up there is to get spells for my Druid because of the major lag I have had
> there ever since it came out. It takes me twice as long to zone there than
> it does anywhere else in the game.
>
> Damasciss Kyndhardt
> 27 Druid
> E'ci
>
It depends on the zone. I zone into nexus and bazaar fairly quickly because
they are small zones. But shadowhaven is a large zone with alot of npcs and
it can take up to 5 min to zone in. I take longer to zone into some places
in velious than in luclin though. Shadowhaven is the slowest zoning in place
I have found though. Lag isn't too bad though.
luv,
-Su
